I've put together a little Gem that lets you use TypeScript within the Asset Pipeline of a rails application.

 

Just add 

 

gem 'typescript-rails'

to your Gemfile and start adding .ts files to your app/assets/javascripts folder. they are automatically compiled to JS for you and when you deploy your app also minified and versioned. 

 

Have fun ;)
